== Triprangode (CT) (627534) ==

Triprangode (CT) is a town in the [[Tirur]] taluka of [[Malappuram]] district with an area of 20.67 sq. km. and harbouring 7821 households with total population of 41167 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Malappuram]] is at a distance of 37 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 380 km. Male population is 19174 and female population is 21993. Scheduled Caste population is 2341 and Scheduled Tribes population is 194. Census Location Code of the town is 627534<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Malappuram (m + og) at a distance of 37 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 52 km. Railway station is at Tirur at a distance of 6 km.
